metadata.title: CVE-2020-28984 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: prive/formulaires/configurer_preferences.php in SPIP before 3.2.8 does notproperly validate the couleur, display, display_navigation, display_outils,imessage, and spip_ecran parameters.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
